description:
Use your strategic skills and tactics to combine your troops and fight epic battles! 

Create powerful units by merging the smaller ones to boost their attack power and health. Turn your army of dinosaurs into the giant species and your team of archers into powerful mages! 

Keep in mind that the cost of new creatures will increase, so merging will become more difficult as time goes on.

Challenge your friend to a battle in local multiplayer mode for 2 players! Deploy your units strategically and as quickly as possible. See what your opponent is up to and when you're ready, cut off their preparation time for an easier win!
 
Fight the bosses, take over the enemy locations, unlock all the creatures and challenge yourself to become the king of the merging wars!

Features:
- the most epic battles!!!
- lots of characters to merge
- boss fights
- competetive multiplayer mode for up to 2 players
- different locations to take over
- fun and addictive gameplay 

Are you ready to join and clash in this dinosaur rampage game?
name: Merge Master
intro: Merge, fight and take down the T-rex!
